languages.text: "Господин испытывал тебя, я не имел права вмешиваться. Он зрел все пути, и сам же рек, что Великие Четверо благословили каждый из них, а значит твои деяния угодны Истине. Ты — чемпион, и я не смею оспаривать твою волю".

"The master was testing you; I had no right to interfere. He beheld every path and he said himself that the Great Four had blessed each of those paths; therefore your deeds have the Truth's blessing. You are a champion and I dare not oppose your will."
languages.original_text: "Господин испытывал тебя, я не имел права вмешиваться. Он зрел все пути, и сам же рек, что Великие Четверо благословили каждый из них, а значит твои деяния угодны Истине. Ты — чемпион, и я не смею оспаривать твою волю".

languages.text: “主人是在考验你，我无权干涉。他注视着每一条路，他亲口告诉我，说伟大的混沌四神为每条道路进行了赐福。因此，你的道路得到了真理的赐福。你是诸神的勇士，我不敢违背你的意愿。”
languages.original_text: "The master was testing you; I had no right to interfere. He beheld every path and he said himself that the Great Four had blessed each of those paths; therefore your deeds have the Truth's blessing. You are a champion and I dare not oppose your will."

traits.locale_text: “主人是在考验你，我无权干涉。他注视着每一条路，他亲口告诉我，说伟大的混沌四神为每条道路进行了赐福。因此，你的道路得到了真理的赐福。你是诸神的勇士，我不敢违背你的意愿。”

languages.text: "Meister hat Euch geprüft. Ich hatte nicht das Recht, mich einzumischen. Er hat jeden Pfad gesehen und selbst gesagt, dass die Großen Vier jeden dieser Pfade gesegnet haben. Daher sind Eure Taten von der Wahrheit gesegnet. Ihr seid ein Champion und ich wage es nicht, mich Eurem Willen zu widersetzen."
languages.original_text: "The master was testing you; I had no right to interfere. He beheld every path and he said himself that the Great Four had blessed each of those paths; therefore your deeds have the Truth's blessing. You are a champion and I dare not oppose your will."

traits.locale_text: "Meister hat Euch geprüft. Ich hatte nicht das Recht, mich einzumischen. Er hat jeden Pfad gesehen und selbst gesagt, dass die Großen Vier jeden dieser Pfade gesegnet haben. Daher sind Eure Taten von der Wahrheit gesegnet. Ihr seid ein Champion und ich wage es nicht, mich Eurem Willen zu widersetzen."

languages.text: «El maestro te estaba poniendo a prueba; no tenía ningún derecho a interferir. Él ha contemplado todos los caminos y dijo que los Cuatro los habían bendecido todos; por tanto, tus actos cuentan con la bendición de la Verdad. Eres {mf|un|una} adalid, y nunca osaría contravenir tu voluntad».
languages.original_text: "The master was testing you; I had no right to interfere. He beheld every path and he said himself that the Great Four had blessed each of those paths; therefore your deeds have the Truth's blessing. You are a champion and I dare not oppose your will."

traits.locale_text: «El maestro te estaba poniendo a prueba; no tenía ningún derecho a interferir. Él ha contemplado todos los caminos y dijo que los Cuatro los habían bendecido todos; por tanto, tus actos cuentan con la bendición de la Verdad. Eres {mf|un|una} adalid, y nunca osaría contravenir tu voluntad».

languages.text: « Le maître vous mettait à l'épreuve, je n'avais pas le droit d'intervenir. Il a vu toutes les voies et a dit lui-même que les Quatre Grands les avaient bénies ; par conséquent, la vérité vous accorde sa bénédiction dans tout ce que vous entreprenez. Je n'oserais jamais m'opposer à la volonté {mf|d'un champion|d'une championne}. »
languages.original_text: "The master was testing you; I had no right to interfere. He beheld every path and he said himself that the Great Four had blessed each of those paths; therefore your deeds have the Truth's blessing. You are a champion and I dare not oppose your will."

traits.locale_text: « Le maître vous mettait à l'épreuve, je n'avais pas le droit d'intervenir. Il a vu toutes les voies et a dit lui-même que les Quatre Grands les avaient bénies ; par conséquent, la vérité vous accorde sa bénédiction dans tout ce que vous entreprenez. Je n'oserais jamais m'opposer à la volonté {mf|d'un champion|d'une championne}. »

languages.text: 「主はお前を試していたのだ。私には干渉する権利はなかった。主はすべての道を見ておられ、偉大なる四使者がそれぞれの道を祝福しておられるとおっしゃった。つまりお前の行いは真実に祝福されている。お前は王者であり、私はお前の意志に逆らう勇気はない」
languages.original_text: "The master was testing you; I had no right to interfere. He beheld every path and he said himself that the Great Four had blessed each of those paths; therefore your deeds have the Truth's blessing. You are a champion and I dare not oppose your will."

traits.locale_text: 「主はお前を試していたのだ。私には干渉する権利はなかった。主はすべての道を見ておられ、偉大なる四使者がそれぞれの道を祝福しておられるとおっしゃった。つまりお前の行いは真実に祝福されている。お前は王者であり、私はお前の意志に逆らう勇気はない」

languages.text: "Efendimiz seni sınıyordu, müdahale etmeye hakkım yoktu. Tüm yolları inceledi ve Büyük Dörtlü'nün her bir yolu kutsadığını bizzat kendisi söyledi. Kısacası eylemlerin, Hakikat tarafından kutsanmıştı. Sen bir müdafisin, iradene karşı gelmeye cüret dahi etmem."
languages.original_text: "The master was testing you; I had no right to interfere. He beheld every path and he said himself that the Great Four had blessed each of those paths; therefore your deeds have the Truth's blessing. You are a champion and I dare not oppose your will."
